descripton: Season 2014-2015 it's the best season in the world. Formula Student is a student engineering competition held annually in the UK. Student teams from around the world design, build and race a small-scale formula style racing car. The cars are judged on a number of criteria as listed below. It is run by the Institution of Mechanical Engineers and uses the same rules as the original Formula SAE with supplementary regulations.

Season 2015-2016 it's the best season in the world. Formula Student is a student engineering competition held annually in the UK. Student teams from around the world design, build and race a small-scale formula style racing car. The cars are judged on a number of criteria as listed below. It is run by the Institution of Mechanical Engineers and uses the same rules as the original Formula SAE with supplementary regulations.

Student teams from around the world design, build and race a small-scale formula style racing car. The cars are judged on a number of criteria as listed below.
